data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Burks, Roger A., Mottern, Jason, Heraty, John M. (2015): Revision of the Orasema festiva species group (Hymenoptera: Chalcidoidea: Eucharitidae). Zootaxa 3972 (4): 521-534, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3972.4.4
